billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

title: Provides specific legal authority for the division of military and naval affairs to initiate routine background checks about certain individuals
currentCommittee: VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
actClause: AN ACT to amend the military law, in relation to providing legal authority for obtaining background checks on individuals involved with law enforcement activities or community programs
